{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Netgear_EA101 |wikipedia = |brand = Netgear |model = EA101 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/03/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Netgear_EA101 |sernum = |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 1.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = corded dongle |vendor_id = 0846 |device_id = 1001 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |ethoui = 00:A0:CC |chip1 = Kawasaki LSI;KL5KUSB101B; |chip2 = Level One;LXT905PC; |chip3 = |chip4 = |linuxdriv = kaweth |windriv = |eth_ports = 1 |eth_speed = 10MbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Lite-On |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = has collision LED |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |price = |upc = 606449005080 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00002EQD2 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China, Taiwan |powledcolor = yes |connactled = yes |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== [http://kaweth.sourceforge.net/ '''kaweth''' project on SourceForge] :A photo of the board shows the EA101 is using a '''Kawasaki LSI (KLSI)''' KL5KUSB101BCL - presumed to be a KL5KUSB101B - with a square 100-pin QFP package. :*A datasheet of the KL5KUSB101 is available [http://pdf.datasheetcatalog.com/datasheets2/30/307947_1.pdf here (on '''datasheecatalog.com''')]. There may be multiple revisions of this adapter. Some are labeled as manufactured in China.. others are labeled as originating from Taiwan. :USB ID 0846:1001 is certianly used by some devices. :USB ID 0846:1002 may be used by others.. Additional specifications, per '''NETGEAR''''s product page, follow... *Dimensions (unit): [[Dimensions::95 mm x 45 mm x 26 mm]] *Cable length: 50.8 cm (20 in) *Weight: [[Weight::63 g]] *Power consumption: 2.0W (400mA @ 5V) *'''Windows 98 Compatible''' ==Links of Interest== [http://web.archive.org/web/20000301152220/http://www.netgearinc.com/products/ea101ds.shtml Product page (via archive.org)]
[http://ec1.images-amazon.com/media/i3d/01/A/man-migrate/MANUAL000005804.pdf Installation Guide (updated?)] (on '''Amazon''', copyright year 2000) [[Category:English Documentation]]
